title: bodyTemperature
description: Send analog input values from temperature sensor

applicationId.description: Unique Connect identifier of the app originating the event. Read-only (added by Connect)

userId.description: Unique Connect identifier of the user originating the event. Read-only (added by Connect)

placeMeasured.description: Part of the body from where the data is acquired

timestamp.description: Timestamp for the production of the phrase
